about_the_game:
Players who purchase Super Rad Raygun before November 15th will receive this soundtrack DLC for free!

Track Listing
01.) Cold Warzone - FantomenK
02.) National Rad'Them - FantomenK
03.) Tainted Lava - BubblePipe Media
04.) Straight Outta Capetown - BubblePipe Media
05.) Gdańsk Gdańsk Revolution - BubblePipe Media
06.) Burning Down the (White)House - FantomenK
07.) Total Collapse of the Marx...ist - FantomenK
08.) Tank on Me - FantomenK
09.) No Sleep Till... - FantomenK
10.) Iran (So Far Away) - FantomenK
11.) 99 Green-Gray Balloons - FantomenK
12.) M.A.D (Mutually Assured Destruction) - FantomenK
13.) Symphony of the Fight - FantomenK
14.) Bhopal Muzik - BubblePipe Media
15.) Hard Spill to Swallow - BubblePipe Media
16.) Anarchy in the Ukraine - FantomenK
17.) Managua Keep Groovin' - BubblePipe Media
18.) Do You Believe in Mir-acles? - BubblePipe Media
19.) Flight for your Right - BubblePipe Media
20.) Can of Czardiens - BubblePipe Media
21.) Everybody Wants to Rule Grenada - BubblePipe Media
22.) Globe Trottin' - FantomenK
23.) Y's Science - BubblePipe Media
24.) National Rad'them Remix - BubblePipe Media
25.) Taking a Nap in the Jungle - FantomenK
detailed_description:
Players who purchase Super Rad Raygun before November 15th will receive this soundtrack DLC for free!

Track Listing
01.) Cold Warzone - FantomenK
02.) National Rad'Them - FantomenK
03.) Tainted Lava - BubblePipe Media
04.) Straight Outta Capetown - BubblePipe Media
05.) Gdańsk Gdańsk Revolution - BubblePipe Media
06.) Burning Down the (White)House - FantomenK
07.) Total Collapse of the Marx...ist - FantomenK
08.) Tank on Me - FantomenK
09.) No Sleep Till... - FantomenK
10.) Iran (So Far Away) - FantomenK
11.) 99 Green-Gray Balloons - FantomenK
12.) M.A.D (Mutually Assured Destruction) - FantomenK
13.) Symphony of the Fight - FantomenK
14.) Bhopal Muzik - BubblePipe Media
15.) Hard Spill to Swallow - BubblePipe Media
16.) Anarchy in the Ukraine - FantomenK
17.) Managua Keep Groovin' - BubblePipe Media
18.) Do You Believe in Mir-acles? - BubblePipe Media
19.) Flight for your Right - BubblePipe Media
20.) Can of Czardiens - BubblePipe Media
21.) Everybody Wants to Rule Grenada - BubblePipe Media
22.) Globe Trottin' - FantomenK
23.) Y's Science - BubblePipe Media
24.) National Rad'them Remix - BubblePipe Media
25.) Taking a Nap in the Jungle - FantomenK
legal_notice: Super Rad Raygun copyright Rooster Teeth Productions, LLC

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB Video RAM and at least Shader Model 2.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB Video RAM and at least Shader Model 2.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Super Rad Raygun - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2, 2ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB Video RAM and at least Shader Model 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The official soundtrack for Super Rad Raygun features 25 original tracks by world renowned artists FantomenK and BubblePipe Media, making this the greatest video game soundtrack of ALL TIME!
